SECRET.
BATTLE SITUATION - NOON - 3rd SEPTEMBER, 1918.
1. WESTERN FRONT.
(a) British Front. In the LYS salient we have taken WULVERGHEM, STEENWERCK, RICHEBOURG ST. VAAST. Thence the line runs due south to FESTUBERT.
Our troops have occupied LENS.
South of the SCARES the line runs ETANG, (inclusive), DURY, (inclusive), WILLERS LES GAGNICOURT, (inclusive), PRONVILIE, (inclusive), DOIGNIES, (inclusive), BERTINCOURT, (inclusive), ROCQUIGNY, ST. PIERRE ST. VAAST WOOL, (inclusive), South of that the line is generally unchanged.
Yesterday we took about 10.000 prisoners.
(b) French Front. On the French front there is no change in the situation.
2. ITALIAN AND MACEDONIAN FRONTS.
There is nothing to report.
?ral Staff,
War Office, S.W.1.
3rd September, 1918.
?ed at 12.50 p.m.
